articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Rafael Nadal celebrates Rohan Bopanna's 'unique' Australian Open triumph - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Bopanna's achievement left 22-time Grand Slam winner Rafael Nadal in complete awe. | Tennis News
articles.content: Indian tennis ace Rohan Bopanna capped off a sensational fortnight in Melbourne with a historic win at the Rod Laver Arena on Saturday. Partnering with Australia's Matthew Ebden, the second-seeded te… [+2030 chars]
